name: The Button (Donkey-Taco, PunchablePlushie, King Bewwy)
description:
You can try the web version but we really recommend you to download and play the windows version for the best experience.

A cat finds a mysterious remote with only one button on it and uses it to turn his furniture into random things. Just a little and fun game we made for 1-Bit Jam.

Credits Donkey TacoCode and DesignPunchablePlushieArt and StoryKing BewwyOpen Game ArtsMusicSyncopika (OGA Page)"Poof" SFXDklon (OGA Page)
